archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains a "Lessons in Lettering" practice book that belonged to W.L. Taylor, Jr. The exercises are completed and graded.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the W.L. Taylor, Jr., Practice Book must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: W.L. Taylor, Jr., Practice Book, Ms1992-030, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The W.L. Taylor, Jr., Practice Book was donated to the Alumni Association in 1989. It was transferred to Special Collections in 1992.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the W.L. Taylor, Jr., Practice Book commenced and was completed in 1992. Additional description was completed in June 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: W.L. Taylor, Jr. was an student at VPI from 1928-1930. No other biographical information is available.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a "Lessons in Lettering" practice book that belonged to W.L. Taylor, Jr. The book is the second in a series, with an emphasis on "Inclined Letter Stroke." Taylor completed the exercises in the book and most are graded in the right margin.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by type of material.
